chapter.title: The Main Window
chapter.para: The navigation works the same as in Norton Commander and Total Commander. With just 3 keys, you can navigate through your entire computer. No need for mouse nor key combos. This is what the whole program is centered about, these 3 keystrokes!
More of the classic shortcuts for navigation.

seglistitem.seg: Switch between left and right panel.

chapter.para: This is where Newton Commander starts to differ from the classic Norton Commander shortcuts.
